mod_name.label: Mod name
mod_name.description: The name of your mod and the assembly (cannot easily change later)

author.label: Author
author.description: Use your Steam profile name for automatic linking of mod to profile (can change later in About.xml)

in_game_description.label: Mod Description
in_game_description.description: The description of the mod as it appears in-game (can change later in About.xml)

mod_ver.label: Mod Version
mod_ver.description: The version of Rimworld this mod is for (default:1.4)

create_empty_definitions.label: Create blank XML definition files
create_empty_definitions.description: Create empty files as templates for your definitions

rw64.label: RimWorldWin64.exe ?
rw64.description: Are you using RimWorldWin64.exe or not to develop?

harmony.label: Include Harmony library
harmony.description: A useful library to safely patch game code. Include it here, unless your mod will depend on HugsLib, or doesn't need to patch.

helloWorld.label: Log Hello World on start
helloWorld.description: A sample so you know your mod is loaded: Do delete this later.

settings.label: Mod Settings
settings.description: Include extra code and files to use built-in Mod Settings

debugLog.label: Log.Message Debug only
debugLog.description: This mod defines its own Log.Message, so Logging uses that instead of Verse.Log.Message. This method is disabled in release builds, so you can keep Log.Message in code, and it never spams users

rider.label: Add Jetbrains Rider IDE config
rider.description: Creates extra config for Jetbrains Rider as a fast track for developers that prefer Rider to Visual Studio or other IDEs

compat.label: Add extra folders for compatibility with other mods
compat.description: Creates extra folders and build steps for compatibility files for other mods.

defOf.label: Include a DefOf class
defOf.description: Creates a DefOf class for your mod, so you can use DefOfs in your code, like MyDefOf.Something.

copyToSteam.label: Copy release to Steam local mods folder
copyToSteam.description: Copy release to Steam local mods folder if RIMWORLD_STEAM_MODS_PATH env var is set.

license.label: License
license.description: Choose a license for your mod. You can change this later. Checkout https://choosealicense.com/ for more info.
